name: Hill St
description: A quieter stretch of Hill Street, hinting at residential life. You are on Hill St. The air here is a little quieter, away from the main thoroughfare, a brief respite from the subtle decay of downtown. Hill St continues its journey to the north and south, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and a few houses that have seen better decades. To the east, the faded marquee of the Essex Theater promises a different kind of escape. The air is still, broken only by the distant hum of traffic and the occasional chirping of a bird, oblivious to the subtle decay.
